result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Rooney

defendant.name: Rooney, Michael J
defendant.address: 634 E Oak Grove St, Juneau, WI 53039

records.addlTxt:
2:00 PM Court calls 22CM4, 22CM33, 22CT36 & 22CT50.  Defendant Michael J Rooney in court.  Attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael Robert Devitt in court for Michael J Rooney. Court finds victim rights compliant.  Attorney Thompson reviews joint agreement.  Parties acknowledge approval w/agreement.  Court questions defendant and reviews chgs and pens.  Defendant enters NC plea in Count 1 in 22CM4 and Count 3 in 22CT36.  Court accepts plea and finds defendant Guilty. Count 1 in 22CM33;  Counts 1 & 2 in 22CT36 and Count 1 in 22CT50 are DRI.  Victim in 22CM4 makes statement. Attorney Thompson heard on sentencing recommendation.  Attorney Devitt heard.  Defendant waives statement.  Court heard and imposes sentence as follows:

Count 1 - 20CM4 & 
withheld sentence - 18 mos probation

COP
pay court costs
comply w/terms of injunction in 21CV414
no violent or abusive contact w/anyone
participate in mental health assessment and follow through w/recommendations
no operation of motor vehicle w/o valid driver license
any counseling per agent

Count 3 - 22CT36
w/held sentence - 18 mos probation - concurrent to 20CM4
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 20, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:01 PM - 22CM04, 22CM33, 22CT36 & 22CT50 - Prosecuting attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael J Rooney in court.  Attorney Michael Robert Devitt in court for Michael J Rooney. Report received. Atty Devitt heard; not willing to waive. Defendant stands mute. Dr Schoenecker s/t by phone. Exhibit List prepared. ADA Thompson heard. Court heard; finds competent to proceed. Discussion on scheduling. Atty Devitt heard; enters plea to Not Guilty/Not Guilty by Mental Disease/Defect in all cases. Court sets TSC.
Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Telephone scheduling conference on May 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.

3:01 PM - 22CM04, 22CM33, 22CT36 & 22CT50 - Prosecuting attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael J Rooney in court.  Attorney Michael Robert Devitt in court for Michael J Rooney. Report received. Atty Devitt heard; not willing to waive. Defendant stands mute. Dr Schoenecker s/t by phone. Exhibit List prepared. ADA Thompson heard. Court heard; finds competent to proceed. Discussion on scheduling. Atty Devitt heard; enters plea to Not Guilty/Not Guilty by Mental Disease/Defect in all cases. Court sets TSC.
Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Telephone scheduling conference on May 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim;  Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle unless he has a valid Wisconsin driver's license.Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

10:38 AM (22CT50/22CM33) Defendant Michael J Rooney in court with attorney Michael Robert Devitt.  Jin Ho D. Pack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. Court enters Not Guilty plea. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA   bond with conditions:  Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim;  Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle unless he has a valid Wisconsin driver's license.Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.  Return date scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Initial appearance on March 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Initial appearance on April 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:37 AM (22CT50/22CM33) Attorney Michael Robert Devitt in court for Defendant Michael J Rooney. Prosecuting Atty Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Michael J Rooney not in court.  State heard on def's FTA for initial appearance; Court order matter continued to next week  Initial appearance scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.
